    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>IPS CodeSystem - Absent and Unknown Data</h2><div><p>International Patient Summary (IPS) codes for &quot;known absent&quot; and &quot;not known&quot; data.</p>
</div><p>This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips defines the following codes:</p><table class="codes"><tr><td><b>Lvl</b></td><td name="absent-unknown-uv-ips-allergic-disposition-not-known"> </a></td><td>Allergic disposition not known</td><td>There is no information available regarding the subject's allergy conditions.</td></tr><tr><td>1</td><td style="white-space:nowrap">no-known-allergy<a name="absent-unknown-uv-ips-no-known-allergy"> </a></td><td>No known allergy</td><td>The subject has no known
